title: Thanksgiving Whites Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, November 19, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a special pre-holiday tasting featuring elegant whites and festive bubbles—perfect for pairing with Thanksgiving dinner.

Tasting Fee: $25 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Flowers Chardonnay 2023 – 93 pts Wine Spectator, Top 100 #43 – Coastal and refined, with lemon zest, green apple, pear, and bright minerality over a silky, balanced palate.

• Roederer Estate Brut NV – 93 pts Wine Spectator, Top 100 #20 – Crisp and lively Anderson Valley sparkling with pear, tangerine, hazelnut, and fine, creamy bubbles.

• Nik Weis Goldtröpfchen Spätlese 2018 – Lush yet balanced Mosel Riesling showing honeysuckle, apricot, honeyed citrus, and slatey minerality.

• Hampton Water Rosé 2024 – Fresh and vibrant with melon, cherry, stone fruit, and subtle herbal notes over a clean, crisp finish.

Discover your perfect Thanksgiving pairing—and enjoy your tasting free with any bottle purchase.
